info.description:
Before using this API, we recommend you read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization-262)** for more information on how to generate an access token. 

Please also be aware that our test environment is based on a subset of the production, in test this API only contains data from the United States, Spain, United Kingdom, Germany and India.
info.title: Airport & City Search

1.1: change default value of view indicator to FULL
New operation GET Airport or City by id
Change the option parameter into view and onlyMajor parameter
add a characters restriction on keyword parameter

parameters.description: sub type of the location (AIRPORT and/or CITY)
parameters.name: subType

parameters.description:
keyword that should represent the start of a word in a city or airport name or code. 
 Supported charaters are: A-Za-z0-9./:-'()"
parameters.name: keyword

parameters.description: Country code of the location using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) code format (e.g. US).
parameters.name: countryCode

get.summary: Returns a list of airports and cities matching a given keyword.
Returns a specific airports or cities based on its id.

pageOffset.description: start index of the requested page
pageOffset.name: page[offset]

sort.description:
defines on which attribute the sorting will be done:
* analytics.travelers.score - sort by the number of travelers by airport or city, the airports and cities with the highest traffic are on top of the results
sort.name: sort

view.description:
select the level of information of the reply:
* LIGHT - Gives only the IATACode, name, detailedName, cityName and countryName
* FULL - Adds on top of the LIGHT information the timeZoneOffset, geocode, detailed address and travelers.score
default option is FULL
view.name: view

400.description:
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
477     | INVALID FORMAT
572     | INVALID OPTION 
2781    | INVALID LENGTH
4926    | INVALID DATA RECEIVED               
32171   | MANDATORY DATA MISSING

cityCode.description: IATA code of the city of the location; equal to IATAcode if the location is a city

cityName.description: name of the city of the location; equal to name if the location is a city

countryCode.description: code of the country of the location in ISO standard

countryName.description: name of the country of the location

regionCode.description: code of the region of the location in ISO standard

stateCode.description: code of the state of the location if any

value.description: great-circle distance between two locations. This distance thus do not take into account traffic conditions; international boundaries; mountains; water; or other elements that might make the a nearby location hard to reach.

errors.detail: no response found for this query parameter
errors.title: NOT FOUND

source.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

example.description: a string indicating an example of the right value

parameter.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the issue

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

source.title: Issue_Source

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this error

title.description: a short summary of the error

detailedName.description: detailed name of the location. For a city location it contains city name and country code. For an airport location it contains city name; country code and airport full name

iataCode.description: IATA code of the location. ([IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) here)

rank.description: the rank is the position compared to other locations based on how famous is a place. 1 being the highest.

relevance.description: score value calculated based on distance and analytics

tags.description: list of tags related to the location

timeZoneOffset.description: timezone offset of the location at the date of the API call (including daylight saving time)

score.description: Approximate score for ranking purposes calculated based on number of travelers in the location.
